channel.title: CaribPVP - Barbados - Unique PK Game Mode!
channel.description:
[center][img]http://caribpvp.com/home/bin/images/newlogo.png[/img][/center] [center][size=18pt]Babados[/size] - [size=14pt]Caribbean Based Runescape Private Server[/size] [/center] [center][size=14pt]www.CaribPvP.com[/size][/center]
[center][size=14pt]How We Differ[/size][/center]
For years RsPs have failed to satisfy the desire of players to enjoy and instant PVP experience, while providing a stable economy for old school skilling and merching players, Barbados aims to be the first server to satisfy this need through simple innovation and refreshing creativity, we'd like to introduce our PK game mode, which will allow the pk world experience WITHIN our economy world without destroying the market and causing inflation for non PK players, through this we hope to maximize our player base as we appeal to whatever experience players seek to have.
[size=14pt]Selecting your mode[/size]
[img]http://puu.sh/mqXqy/ea36823c82.jpg[/img]
[size=14pt]Anti Economy Destruction Measures![/size]
[img]http://puu.sh/mqXB2/11a2956abb.jpg[/img]
[size=14pt]PK Mode Starter[/size]
[img]http://puu.sh/mqXO3/f8da9025e8.jpg[/img]
[left][size=10pt]Vision:[/size][/left]
Barbados is a 317 Runescape Private Server hosted locally on the island, initially to please the local RSPS playing community and our friends throughout the region, However upon recognizing that others wished to play our server from outside of the Caribbean region, we've decided to construct a stable, entertaining and community based private server which we wish to invite all vivid RSPS gamers to join!
What We Can Guarantee:
[ul][li]Lag Free Gameplay[/li] [li]Friendly Community[/li] [li]No Dupes[/li] [li]Constant Development & Updates[/li][/ul]
Current Projects:
Recreating our previous Hunger Games & Whip Game (Based on COD - Gun Game):
[img]http://puu.sh/lR28h/eb6916960b.png[/img]
Stay tuned!
[center]Gameplay Media:
Full Screen w/ Custom Minigames [img]http://puu.sh/lKqzW/80b4d3920b.jpg[/img]
New Bosses & Zones [img]http://puu.sh/lKqG6/2f09332cd0.jpg[/img]
All Skills Working [img]http://puu.sh/lKq2U/64f4f58e75.png[/img]
Achievement System [img]http://puu.sh/lKq4v/1c2ab0c3e4.jpg[/img][/center] [center][size=14pt]
Note. Previous Servers established by team members include: CaribHUB, Epicurus, EpicPvP, BoboPvP, Solitude & Guthix-RSPS We're extremely experienced in this field and will bring you the best possible gaming experience available! Don't pass judgement on what we are now, but watch what we will become. ADD US ON SNAPCHAT - CaribHUB[/size][/center]

item.title: CaribPVP - Barbados - Unique PK Game Mode!
item.dc:creator: @ItsJinx ItsJinx
item.description:
@ItsJinx wrote:

After many days of playing I can confirm this is the most community-orientated RSPS’ I’ve ever played in my life.

Read full topic
item.source: CaribPVP - Barbados - Unique PK Game Mode!

item.description:
@CaribHUB wrote:

[center][/center]
[center][size=18pt]Babados[/size] - [size=14pt]Caribbean Based Runescape Private Server[/size]
[/center]
[center][size=14pt]www.CaribPvP.com[/size][/center]

[center][size=14pt]How We Differ[/size][/center]

For years RsPs have failed to satisfy the desire of players to enjoy and instant PVP experience, while providing a stable economy for old school skilling and merching players, Barbados aims to be the first server to satisfy this need through simple innovation and refreshing creativity, we’d like to introduce our PK game mode, which will allow the pk world experience WITHIN our economy world without destroying the market and causing inflation for non PK players, through this we hope to maximize our player base as we appeal to whatever experience players seek to have.

[size=14pt]Selecting your mode[/size]

[size=14pt]Anti Economy Destruction Measures![/size]

[size=14pt]PK Mode Starter[/size]

[left][size=10pt]Vision:[/size][/left]

Barbados is a 317 Runescape Private Server hosted locally on the island, initially to please the local RSPS playing community and our friends throughout the region, However upon recognizing that others wished to play our server from outside of the Caribbean region, we’ve decided to construct a stable, entertaining and community based private server which we wish to invite all vivid RSPS gamers to join!

What We Can Guarantee:

[ul][li]Lag Free Gameplay[/li]
[li]Friendly Community[/li]
[li]No Dupes[/li]
[li]Constant Development & Updates[/li][/ul]

Current Projects:

Recreating our previous Hunger Games & Whip Game (Based on COD - Gun Game):

Stay tuned!

[center]Gameplay Media:

Full Screen w/ Custom Minigames

New Bosses & Zones

All Skills Working

[/center]
[center][size=14pt]

Note.
Previous Servers established by team members include: CaribHUB, Epicurus, EpicPvP, BoboPvP, Solitude & Guthix-RSPS
We’re extremely experienced in this field and will bring you the best possible gaming experience available!
Don’t pass judgement on what we are now, but watch what we will become.
